name: SchoolTube Shortcode
author: Jeremy Wood

sections.description:
This plugin uses the [schooltube][/schooltube] shortcode to grab the

<

iframe> embed code from http://www.schooltube.com/oembed.xml?url=. This plugin does NO error checking yet I.e. it will accept (and fail, possibly miserably) with any URL/code. Do not use where untrusted/uneducated people post content. Also, this plugin does not yet allow you to set/change the default size (which comes from the schooltube.com XML file).
sections.installation:
1. Upload the files to the /wp-content/plugins/schooltube-shortcode/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
